# relativeTime

**Instance Property**

The start time of the event, relative to other events in the same pattern.

## Declaration

```swift
var relativeTime: TimeInterval { get set }
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticParameterCurve/relativeTime] of zero indicates immediate playback. Another haptic event starting one second later would have a [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticEvent/relativeTime] of `1`.

## Configuring Haptic Events

- **eventParameters**: An array of event parameters, possibly empty.
- **CHHapticEvent.ParameterID**: An identifier for an event parameter.
- **duration**: The duration of the haptic event.
